title: Ong-Bak?
content:
Anyone seen [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0368909/]this movie[/url]? I just watched it last night, and it's amazing. The stunts are amazing, as are the fight scenes, but I think the characters are actually pretty good too.________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/toughyorp.png[/img]

title: Re: Ong-Bak?
content: I thought the characters were pretty cliche, but what I was impressed with was the fact that there were no wires or special effects or anything, just real hardcore action.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Ong-Bak?
content:
Yes, I didn't mean that the characters were original so much as that they were well acted. They were interesting as people rather than as plot details.________________
